Text: How would not voting solve this shitty slave capitalist system? It's your civic duty to vote and only then can you start spouting rhetoric about capitalism.

You're right bobdaslob, we should all take part in groupthink and do what the god-box tells us......

For the first time IN OUR LIVES we have the chance to vote for a president who tells us the truth. I don't care what the media says or doesn't say about him. I don't care what "front-runner" they are telling me is winning this week. 

I DO NOT have to vote for the lesser of two evils in 2008 - and I won't. 

RonPaul2008.com
